error.invalid_url_schema:
Invalid URL scheme.
The URL should start with `http://` or `https://`.

recommended_version.description:
We detected that you are using an outdated go2rtc server version. For the best experience, we recommend updating the go2rtc server to version `{recommended_version}`.
Currently you are using version `{current_version}`.
recommended_version.title: Outdated go2rtc server detected
